title: Remove Our Story strip, verify product page filters/nav, add category product rows on homepage

requirements.summary: Remove the OurStoryStrip component from the homepage
acceptanceCriteria: The OurStoryStrip component is no longer rendered on the homepage
No visual gap or empty space is left where the strip used to be
The rest of the homepage layout remains unaffected

file_operations.description: Remove the OurStoryStrip component import and its usage from the page layout. Ensure the spacing between remaining sections (HomeCarousel, NewArrivalsSection, HomeCategoryCarouselsSection, and product grid) remains consistent without introducing gaps.

requirements.summary: Ensure all product category pages include functional filter bar and category navigation

A horizontal category navigation bar is visible on every product category page
Selecting a filter updates the displayed product grid accordingly
Clicking a category in the navigation bar routes to that category page

Add HeaderCategoryNav at the top of the page to display category navigation. Ensure filters and navigation work correctly with the existing product query and filtering logic.

requirements.summary: Add horizontally scrollable category product rows below each carousel on homepage
acceptanceCriteria: A horizontally scrollable product row appears below each category carousel section on the homepage
Exactly 3 square product cards are visible at a time without needing to scroll
No scrollbar is visible on the row (scrollbar hidden via CSS)
Each card displays the product image cropped to a square aspect ratio, product name, and price in INR
Only products belonging to the relevant category are shown in each row
Clicking a product card navigates to that product's detail page
The rows scroll smoothly by touch/swipe or mouse drag

file_operations.description: Create a new component that displays a horizontally scrollable row of product cards for a specific category. Accept categorySlug as a prop and query products filtered by that category using existing product hooks. Display exactly 3 square product cards visible at once using CSS grid with snap scrolling. Each card should show: product image in 1:1 aspect ratio (using object-fit: cover), product name (truncated if needed), and price formatted in INR using the pricing utility. Hide the scrollbar using CSS (scrollbar-width: none and ::-webkit-scrollbar). Enable smooth horizontal scrolling via overflow-x: scroll and scroll-snap-type. Make each card clickable to navigate to /product/[productId] using TanStack Router Link. Apply responsive touch/swipe support for mobile devices.

Below each CategoryImageCarousel pair (carousel index 1 and 2), add the new CategoryProductRow component. Pass the appropriate categorySlug prop matching the category being displayed. Ensure the product row is positioned directly below the category description with appropriate spacing (e.g., mt-4 or mt-6). Maintain the existing vertical layout of category sections while adding the product rows seamlessly.

Verify that HomePage includes HomeCategoryCarouselsSection and that it renders correctly with the new category product rows below each carousel section. Ensure the overall page layout accommodates the new rows without breaking existing spacing or scroll behavior.
